definitions.definition: Synonym of outcast : A person despised and excluded by their family , community , or society , especially a member of the untouchable castes in Indian society .
A similarly despised group of people or species of animal .
Ellipsis of pariah dog ( “ an Indian breed , any stray dog in Indian contexts ” ) .

main_definition: Synonym of outcast : A person despised and excluded by their family , community , or society , especially a member of the untouchable castes in Indian society .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) A similarly despised group of people or species of animal .
( zoology ) Ellipsis of pariah dog ( “ an Indian breed , any stray dog in Indian contexts ” ) .
